SEARCH
Module com.example.rupizzeria
Package controllers

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
controllers.CurrentOrderController
public class CurrentOrderController extends Object
Controller class for managing the current order view. Handles adding, removing, and placing pizzas in the current order.
Since:
2024-11-17
Author:
Pranav Chundi

      Formats the details of a pizza into a readable string for display.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a string representation of the pizza's details

    • determinePizzaType

      private String determinePizzaType(Pizza pizza)
      Determines the style of the pizza based on its crust type.
      Parameters:
      pizza - the Crust object to evaluate
      Returns:
      a string representing the pizza style ("Chicago Style" or "NY Style, etc ")

    • determinePizzaStyle

      private String determinePizzaStyle(Crust crust)
      Determines the style of the pizza based on its crust type.
      Parameters:
      crust - the Crust object to evaluate
      Returns:
      a string representing the pizza style ("Chicago Style" or "NY Style")

    • updateTotals

      private void updateTotals()
      Updates the subtotal, sales tax, and total fields for the current order.

    • removePizza

      private void removePizza()
      Removes the selected pizza from the current order. If no pizza is selected, shows an alert.

    • clearOrder

      private void clearOrder()
      Clears all pizzas from the current order.

    • placeOrder

      private void placeOrder()
      Places the current order and resets the view for a new order. If the order is empty, shows an alert.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an informational alert with the specified message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display in the alert
